text: Kyzyl-Bayrak () is a rural locality (a village) in Ishkarovsky Selsoviet, Ilishevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 62 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 13 km from Verkhneyarkeyevo, 4 km from Ishkarovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ilishevsky District
title: Kyzyl-Bayrak, Ilishevsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
